titleStmt.title: SII 14.267: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 267. (A.R. No. 393 of 1917.) KĪL6APPĀVŪR, TENKASI TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE IN THE TIRUVĀLĪŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription commences with the praśasti of Tirumaḍandaiyum Jayamaḍan-daiyum, etc., of Jaṭāvarmaṉ Śrīvallabha and records the gift of land made tax free in Paṭṭamaṅgalam separated from Kuṟuṅgāṉam alias Teliṅgakulakāla-chaturvēdimaṅ-galam to the god of the temple of Tirukkapālīśvaram in Pāgūr alias Kshatrīyaśikhā-maṇi-nallūr in Kuṟumaṟai-nāḍu. The king whose name and regnal year are lost is stated to have issued the order from the throne called Kaliṅgattaraiyaṉ in his palace at Madurai. The 55th day is however mentioned in the body. The gift land is stated to have been renamed as Sundarapāṇḍiyaṉ-viḷāgam.

revisionDesc.change: Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tirumaṭantaiyum ceyamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyattu kaṉṉaṟāḷitiruppa Read tiruppuyaṅkaḷiliṉitiruppa. yiru-nilam perumai Eyta Eṇṭicaiyuṅ kuṭainiḻaṟṟa maṉṉavarkaṉ vantiṟaiñca maravil varum muṭicūṭi teṉkumariyum vaṭakeṅkai tiraik kaṭalellai The inscription is built in at this and the corresponding section of the other lines.⎯⎯ṅkoluTaṉ vaḷara maṉṉiya vira siṅhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyāroṭum māmutal matikkulam viḷaṅ The inscription is built in at this and the corresponding section of the other lines.
ku māṭakkuḷakkiḻ maturaikkoyilu Uḷālai Aḻakiya pāṇṭiyaṉ kūṭattup paḷḷippiṭaṅ kaliṅkattaraiyaṉileḻuntaruḷiyiruttu nāḷaimpattañciṉāl kuṟumaṟai nāṭṭup pākūrāṉa kṣattiriy(ā)cikāmaṇinallūr Uṭaiār tirukkavālicura muṭai ⎯⎯ttukku Ikkoyilil tevakaṉmikaḷum cirimāyecurarkaḷum viṇṇappañceyya tiruvāḻa malarntaruḷiṉa
nitta ṉamantaṅkaḷukku Iṭṭa tevatāṉaṅ kuṟuṅkāṉamāṉ teliṅkkulakālac catuṟveti maṅkalattu teṉpāl piṟinta paṭṭamaṅkalattu nālveliyeṉṟu per kūvappaṭṭa nilattu peruṉāṉkellai yāvatu kiḻak ⎯⎯ kum teṟkellaivaṭaveḷḷaikālukku vaṭakkum meṟkellai Ikkālil Aṇaikkuk kiḻakkum
paṭṭa ṉilam Iṟai curukki paḻam per tavirttu Iṉṉāyaṉāṟku kārāṇmai meyyācci Aṉ� Iṟaiyili tevatāna(ma)mākki cuntarapāṇṭiyaṉ viḷāka(m) meṉṉum tirunāmattāl veṟumutalākki Ikkoyilil paḷḷikoṇṭāḷvārukku Inilat til Aiñcumāvum Iṟaiiyili tevatāṉamāka maṟṟum Epperp paṭṭaṉavum ta� kuṭuttom Ippaṭikku—kaliṅkarāyan Eḻuttu
